item.title: Bella add a quote by Taylor Swift
item.description: "When I was a little girl I used to read fairy tales. In fairy tales you meet Prince Charming and he's everything you ever wanted. In fairy tales the bad guy is very easy to spot. The bad guy is always wearing a black cape so you always know who he is. Then you grow up and you realize that Prince Charming is not as easy to find as you thought. You realize the bad guy is not wearing a black cape and he's not easy to spot; he's really funny, and he makes you laugh, and he has perfect hair." -- Taylor Swift

item.title: Bella add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "If Iâ€™m honest I have to tell you I still read fairy-tales and I like them best of all." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Bella add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "(24/7) once you sign on to be a mother, that's the only shift they offer." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Bella add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Bella add a quote by Roxanne Henke
item.description: "Supermom wasn't a bad job description. The pay was lousy if you were talking about real money. But the payoff was priceless in so many other ways." -- Roxanne Henke

item.title: Bella add a quote by Bella Pollen
item.description: "Children expect their mothers to love them, no matter what. Those who don't get this tend to feel cheated the rest of their lives." -- Bella Pollen
